title: Web-Based Lifelong Learning: Short-Intensive Social Sector Courses Utilizing Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of social sciences and digital literacy
context.additional_context: Providing a web-based learning environment utilizing personal devices (BYOD) for office/administrative professionals, with a formative assessment-centered feedback system

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world social issues and propose solutions using web-based tools.
Learners can acquire and apply core theories through 15-minute microlearning content optimized for mobile environments.
Learners can complete knowledge-sharing and feedback processes with peer learners using online collaboration tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
